name: Keen Astoria West Sandals - Women's
description:
Serious traction when it's wet, comfort when it's dry, these supportive sandals go from beach to trail to town without stopping. Closed toe bumper stops you from stubbing your toes on roots, and a heel lift adds cushion underfoot.Upper webbing is made from recycled plastic bottles.Quick-lock lace system locks your foot securely in place.EVA footbed supports your arches for all-day wear.Compression-moulded EVA midsole balances comfort and cushioning, with integrated shank for stability.Non-marking Aquagrip rubber with siping for grip on wet and slippery surfaces.

        Sustainability
